llm_res.rule: The function _requireMinted(uint256 tokenId) should revert if the token has not been minted yet.
llm_res.function: The _requireMinted function is implemented but does not contain any logic to check if the token has been minted.

llm_res.rule: decimals - Returns the number of decimals the token uses - e.g. 8, means to divide the token amount by 100000000 to get its user representation. OPTIONAL - This method can be used to improve usability, but interfaces and other contracts MUST NOT expect these values to be present.
